title: Hour 2 – Ric Bucher (07-06-20)
itunes:title: Hour 2 – Ric Bucher (07-06-20)
description:
FOX Sports Radio hosts Jason Smith and Doug Gottlieb are in for Dan and the Danettes, and they discuss President Trump demanding NASCAR driver Bubba Wallace apologize for the noose incident at Talladega calling it a “hoax”. They talk to NBA Insider Ric Bucher about several NBA teams shutting down their facilities after an outbreak of the coronavirus. They also react to the Washington Nationals calling out the MLB for delayed test results and being forced to cancel practice.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
